toolkit.domain

Class OpenReadingFrameFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolkit.domain.OpenReadingFrameFinder

  • public class OpenReadingFrameFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by James Euesden on 2/22/2016. Searches through a provided String (a contiguous read) to find areas of potential gene encoding regions (Open Reading Frames - ORF) within the open reading frames (1 - 6) and creates OpenReadingFrameLocations in an OpenReadingFrameResult.

      Constructors

    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenReadingFrameFinder

        public OpenReadingFrameFinder()

    • Method Detail

      • findPotentialOrfLocations

        public OpenReadingFrameResult findPotentialOrfLocations(java.lang.String contiguousRead)
        Entry point in finding any ORF Locations.Creates a new OpenReadingFrameResult object to be populated and creates the frames from the contiguous read to be inspected, then calls to find ORF Locations in each of the frames. Each call returns an OpenReadingFrameResult based on just that Frame. The final returned ORFResult is also an OpenReadingFrameResult class, with each of the ORF Locations from each frame combined within it.
        Parameters:
        contiguousRead - The contiguous read characters to be searched through.
        Returns:
        An OpenReadingFrameResult containing all of the ORF locations found in the provided contiguous read.

      • getOrfResultFromFrame

        private OpenReadingFrameResult getOrfResultFromFrame(java.lang.String contigFrame,
                                                     int frameNumberModifier,
                                                     int frameIndicator)
        For individual frames, finds the Start and Stop Codons from within that frame and then calls to a method to use those to find the OpenReadingFrameLocations within the contiguous read frame provided.
        Parameters:
        contigFrame - The characters of the frame from the contiguous read.
        frameNumberModifier - The frame number modifier (used for correctly placing the index of an ORF location).
        frameIndicator - Indicates what frame an ORF may be from, minus 1 (e.g. Frame 1 is indicator 0).
        Returns:
        Returns the results of carrying out an ORF Location search on this Frame.

      • stopCodonDetected

        private boolean stopCodonDetected(java.lang.String codon)
        Looks if the String provided matches a Stop Codon.
        Parameters:
        codon - The provided characters, expected to be three characters in length.
        Returns:
        A boolean of whether the characters provided are actually a Stop Codon or not, doesn't matter which it is.

      • constructOrfsFromCodons

        private OpenReadingFrameResult constructOrfsFromCodons(java.util.ArrayList<Codon> startCodons,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<Codon> stopCodons,
                                                       java.lang.String contigFrame,
                                                       int frameNumberModifier,
                                                       int frameIndicator)
        Using the lists of Start and Stop Codons in a frame, looks to stitch together ORF Locations.
        Parameters:
        startCodons - The list of Start Codons.
        stopCodons - The list of Stop Codons.
        contigFrame - The contiguous read data from this frame.
        frameNumberModifier - The frame number to modify the indexes of any ORF Location to match the real contiguous read.
        frameIndicator - The frame number (minus 1).
        Returns:
        Returns the result of any ORF Locations found within this frame, using the Start and Stop Codons provided.

      • createCompletedOrf

        private OpenReadingFrameLocation createCompletedOrf(java.lang.String contigFrame,
                                                    Codon startCodon,
                                                    Codon stopCodon,
                                                    int frameNumberModifier,
                                                    int frameIndicator)
        Assembles an ORF Location with the provided components, stitching it together, getting the characters between the provided start and stop codon.
        Parameters:
        contigFrame - The characters of the contiguous read from the frame in question.
        startCodon - The Codon that marks the start of the ORF Location.
        stopCodon - The Codon that marks the end of the ORF Location.
        frameNumberModifier - The modified to the ORF Location indexes.
        frameIndicator - The frame indicator to identify which frame the constructed ORF Location is from.
        Returns:
        A completed OpenReadingFrameLocation.

      • correctReverseFrameIndexes

        private OpenReadingFrameResult correctReverseFrameIndexes(OpenReadingFrameResult reverseFrameResult,
                                                          int contigLength)
        Corrects the indexes of a reverse frame. Since the frame indexes will be reversed when the ORF Locations are constructed, the indexes are corrected to display where the actual 'start' and 'stop' locations are from when the contiguous is in the original direction.
        Parameters:
        reverseFrameResult - The OpenReadingFrameResult of a reverse frame.
        contigLength - The length of the original and full contiguous read.
        Returns:
        The OpenReadingFrameResult with corrected indexes.
